data.text: Mmuae pa sianka abufuwhyew,
Onyansafo tɛkrɛma yi nimdeɛ ayɛ,
Awurade ani hu baabiara,
Tɛkrɛma a ɛde abodwo ba yɛ nkwadua,
Ɔkwasea mfa nʼagya nteɛso nyɛ hwee,
Ahonya bebree wɔ ɔtreneeni fi,
Anyansafo ano trɛtrɛw nimdeɛ mu,
Awurade kyi amumɔyɛfo afɔrebɔ,
Awurade kyi amumɔyɛfo akwan,
Asotwe dennen wɔ hɔ ma nea ɔman fi ɔkwan no so,
Owu ne Ɔsɛe da Awurade anim,
Ɔfɛwdifo mpɛ nteɛso;
Anigye koma ma anim yɛ sereserew,
Nhumufo koma hwehwɛ nimdeɛ,
Wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so nna nyinaa yɛ mmɔbɔmmɔbɔ,
Ketewa bi a yenya a Awurade suro ka ho no ye
Nhabamma aduan a ɔdɔ wɔ mu no ye
Nea ne bo fuw ntɛm no de mpaapaemu ba,
Nsɔe ama onihawfo kwan asiw,
Ɔba nyansafo ma nʼagya ani gye,
Agyimisɛm ma nea onni adwene ani gye,
Nhyehyɛe a enni afotu no sɛe,
Onipa a ɔma mmuae a ɛfata no ani gye,
Onyansafo asetena mu kwan ma no nkɔso,
Awurade sɛe ɔhantanni fi,
Awurade kyi amumɔyɛfo nsusuwii,
Odifudepɛfo de ɔhaw brɛ nʼabusua,
Ɔtreneeni koma kari ne mmuae,
Awurade mmɛn amumɔyɛfo koraa,
Anim a ɛtew ma koma nya ahomeka,
Nea otie animka a ɛma nkwa no
Nea ɔmfa ahohyɛso no bu ne ho animtiaa,
Awurade suro kyerɛ onipa nyansa,
